name: Greater Scrag
description: The Greater Scrag is a large, chaotic evil monstrosity found lurking in murky depths, known for its formidable strength and resilient nature. It has a tough exterior with natural armor and a powerful physique.
memorable: This creature can regenerate health while submerged, making it a persistent threat.
goals: To hunt weaker creatures and establish dominance in its aquatic territory.
relations: Often found in swamps or near bodies of water, potentially alongside other aquatic threats.
strengths: Excellent hit points and strong regeneration abilities while submerged.
weaknesses: Slow movement and vulnerability to acid and fire, which cancels its regeneration.
attacks: The Greater Scrag can make three attacks in a turn: one vicious bite and two claw strikes, delivering substantial damage to enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration, which allows it to heal while submerged and remain a significant challenge in combat.
senses: It has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in the dark aquatic environments.
additional_information: Blood Frenzy grants advantage against wounded opponents.
Can only be truly killed if it starts its turn with 0 hit points.
Preferred habitat includes swamps and dark waters.
test_queries: chaotic evil creature from murky swamps
strong water monster that regenerates health
